document.full_text: nearly 3 million acres of farm land in three southern u.s. states have been submerged by flood waters from the raging mississippi river and its smaller tributaries, adding to troubles in seeding this year's crops in the world's top grain exporter.
document.title: "once in a lifetime" flood submerges farm land
lines_and_colors: nearly 3 million acres of farm land in three southern u.s. states have been submerged by flood waters from the raging mississippi river and its smaller tributaries, adding to troubles in seeding this year's crops in the world's top grain exporter.
